item.description:
Damaged road surface damaged around bus stop, deep enough to unsteady a cyclist

item.title: No cleaning was carried out today when for reported, 9th February

item.title: Near to The Saddler an other next buildings, 9th February
item.description:

item.title: The Saddler Building, A2dominion, 9th February
item.description:
Hi, we have not seen regular street cleaning in this area. There is always trash lying around here. Who is responsible for this area? The building management company or the municipality?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wharf Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple mattresses & debris, 9th February
item.description:
Lots of mattresses, debris, etc that is all over the middle of our estate, infront of Oval House. The Bin areas are over-run, this is a disgrace and we don't know what to do about it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Luscombe Way, Vauxhall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, New Beckenham, Greater London

item.title: Unauthorised union flag flying from council lampost, 9th February
item.description:
This flag has been placed illegaly on street furniture and is being used in a divisive way residents are not comfortable with this, please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thayers Farm Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unavoidable potholes, 9th February
item.description:
Multiple potholes all within left wheel line. First pothole larger than 50mm deep. This should require a Cat 1. Viafix all of them on a 15min closure. I will be claiming as soon as I damage a tyre or suspension on these defects.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A101, Limehouse, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned illegally parked van, 9th February
item.description:
Van, which is partly out of legal parking bay, has not moved for almost 3 months and does not have a valid MOT. Reg is GN15 0OJ. This has been reported multiple times by neighbours via this platform and police and still no action!!! Get it back to its rightful owner!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Lavernock Road, Barnehurst, Bexleyheath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 x large potholes next to speed bump, 9th February
item.description:
These potholes are right before the speed bump forcing drivers over to the right and onto the other side causing them to then go over the speed bump unevenly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Hill Road, East Barnet, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish flytipped on Ravens Way just before junction with Ravens Mews, 9th February
item.description:
Rubbish has been dumped on Ravens Way, just before the junction with Ravens Mews. Looks like diy or decorating trade waste. Wasn't there this morning 7am but was there by 6pm today, 9th February.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eltham Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet
